item.title: Demo - Clothing Store
item.description:
1, Insert into Static block or CMS page for developing:

{{block class="Magetop\Menupro\Block\Menu" name="menupro_group_4" groupmenu_id="4" template="Magetop_Menupro::menupro/menupro.phtml" }}

2, Reference via XML layout file( to replace the default menu or other purpose):


groupmenu_id4


3, Call via frontend template file:

getLayout()->createBlock("Magetop\Menupro\Block\Menu")->setGroupmenu_id(4)->setTemplate("Magetop_Menupro::menupro/menupro.phtml")->toHtml(); ?>
